hero.tripDescription: Apr 1 (Wed) - Apr 13 (Mon), 2026 · A 13-day in-depth family trip featuring sunshine, beaches, desert, and the city that never sleeps.
hero.flightDescription: STARLUX Airlines direct flight to Ontario (ONT), enjoy comfortable time in the clouds.
hero.attractionsDescription: From world-class museums to magnificent national parks, all in one view.
hero.foodDescription: Enjoy diverse culinary culture, from Michelin restaurants to classic road burgers.
hero.infoDescription: Organize passports, visas, and luggage lists for a worry-free vacation.

itinerary.overviewDescription: Starting from Los Angeles, combining Las Vegas Grand Canyon group tour, coastal self-driving, and San Diego city exploration. Here's a quick summary of the 13-day itinerary. Click on any day to view detailed arrangements and route maps.
itinerary.selectDay: Please select a day to view the itinerary.
itinerary.hotelNote: Hotels are for reference only. Final accommodation is subject to actual booking.

day1.title: Arrival and Settling In
day1.description: Arrive at Ontario Airport in the evening, complete customs procedures, then head to Rowland Heights for rest and time zone adjustment.

meals.dinner: Taiwanese cuisine in Rowland Heights (e.g., Half & Half)

transport: Shuttle/Uber to accommodation (approx. 30 minutes)

day2.title: Coastal Vibes Santa Monica
day2.description: Pick up rental car and head to vibrant Santa Monica Beach and Pier, enjoy California sunshine and Pacific ocean breeze.

meals.dinner: Din Tai Fung or other restaurants

transport: Self-drive (approx. 1 hour one way)

day3.title: Art and Luxury
day3.description: Visit Getty Center in the morning to appreciate art collections, then stroll through luxurious Beverly Hills and Rodeo Drive in the afternoon.

meals.dinner: Beverly Hills or return to Rowland Heights

transport: Self-drive (approx. 50-60 minutes one way)

day4.title: NBA Game Experience Night
day4.description: Relaxed shopping during the day, then head to Crypto.com Arena in the evening to experience NBA atmosphere.
transport: Self-drive (approx. 45 minutes one way)

day5.title: [Group Tour] To Las Vegas
day5.description: Depart in the morning for the gambling capital, passing through desert scenery. Free time in the evening, visit Bellagio Fountains or Old Town light show.

meals.lunch: Guide will recommend based on actual situation
meals.dinner: Guide will recommend based on actual situation

transport: From Los Angeles to Las Vegas; Travel: approx. 430 km / approx. 300 minutes
day5.departureLocation: Island Restaurant (next to De Cheng Market in Rowland Heights); 1463 Nogales St, Rowland Heights, CA 91748

day6.title: [Group Tour] Zion National Park & Bryce Canyon
day6.description: Las Vegas → Zion National Park (45 min) → Bryce Canyon National Park (60 min) → Glen Canyon Dam (pass by) → Lake Powell (pass by) → Page

meals.breakfast: Guide will recommend based on actual situation
meals.lunch: Guide will recommend based on actual situation

day7.title: [Group Tour] Antelope Canyon & Grand Canyon National Park
day7.description: Today we will depart from Page, heading to Antelope Canyon and Horseshoe Bend, starting a journey of natural wonders. During today's trip, you will also have the opportunity to visit the origin point of the Grand Canyon - Lake Powell, or admire the magnificent scenery of the Colorado River winding through the canyon floor at Grand Canyon National Park. Finally, we will return to Las Vegas with wonderful natural memories.

meals.breakfast: Guide will recommend based on actual situation
meals.lunch: Guide will recommend based on actual situation
meals.dinner: Guide will recommend based on actual situation

transport: Drive from Lower Antelope Canyon to Horseshoe Bend; Travel: approx. 12 km / approx. 15 minutes
Drive from Horseshoe Bend to Grand Canyon National Park; Travel: approx. 177 km / approx. 120 minutes
Return from Grand Canyon National Park to Las Vegas

3. Lower Antelope Canyon ticket USD 150 / person (paid when purchasing the tour)

day8.title: [Group Tour End] Las Vegas Sign & Seven Magic Mountains
day8.description: Las Vegas Welcome Sign & M&M's World & Coca-Cola Store (required, 60 min) → FlyOver Las Vegas (optional, 25 min) → Seven Magic Mountains (30 min) → Barstow Outlets (120 min) → Los Angeles
highlights: Welcome to Fabulous Las Vegas Sign

day9.title: Brea / Hsi Lai & Palm Springs VillageFest
day9.description: In the morning, depart from Rowland Heights and choose between a stroll and shopping at Brea Downtown or a self-guided visit with vegetarian buffet lunch at Hsi Lai Temple; after lunch, drive to Palm Springs for the aerial tramway, then end the day at the VillageFest Thursday night street fair.

meals.lunch: Brea Downtown / Hsi Lai Temple vegetarian buffet

transport: Self-drive (approx. 1.5 hours one way)

timeline.title: Transport
timeline.description: Depart from Rowland Heights and drive to either Brea Downtown or Hsi Lai Temple.

timeline.title: Attractions
description: 9:30 AM arrive at Brea Downtown, stroll and shopping until 11:00 AM.
11:00 AM-12:15 PM Lunch at Bruxie / Ruby's / Cha Cha's in Brea Downtown.

timeline.title: Attractions
description: 9:30 AM arrive at Hsi Lai Temple parking lot (15-20 min).
9:30-11:00 AM Hsi Lai Temple self-guided tour (photos, garden).
11:30 AM-12:15 PM Vegetarian buffet lunch (around USD 10 per person).

timeline.title: Lunch
description: Option 1: 11:00 AM-12:15 PM · Lunch at Bruxie / Ruby’s / Cha Cha’s in Brea Downtown.
Option 2: 11:30 AM-12:15 PM · Vegetarian buffet lunch at Hsi Lai Temple (around USD 10 per person).

timeline.title: Accommodation
timeline.description: Check in, drop off luggage and rest.

timeline.title: Attractions
timeline.description: Afternoon tram ride and enjoy the mountain view and sunset.

timeline.title: Attractions
timeline.location: Palm Springs VillageFest (downtown street fair, every Thursday)
description: Weekly street fair held every Thursday evening on Downtown Palm Canyon Drive.
Highlights: food vendors, live performances, handicrafts, street art displays.
Palm Springs Art Museum offers free admission on Thursdays.
Packed with people and full of energy; perfect time for dinner and night stroll.

day10.title: Joshua Tree & To San Diego
day10.description: Enjoy a relaxed breakfast at the Palm Springs hotel, then drive to Joshua Tree National Park for a short visit and photos. In the afternoon, drive south to San Diego and check into your Airbnb. Choose between visiting La Jolla Cove to see sea lions followed by dinner in Little Italy, or going directly to the supermarket to buy groceries and cook dinner at the Airbnb.

meals.lunch: Crossroads Cafe / In-N-Out Burger (Cabazon) / Natural Sisters Cafe
meals.dinner: Option 1: Little Italy / Option 2: Buy groceries and cook at Airbnb

transport: Self-drive from Palm Springs to Joshua Tree West Entrance (approx. 1 hour)
Self-drive from Joshua Tree to San Diego (approx. 2.75–3 hours)
Self-drive from Airbnb to La Jolla Cove (approx. 15–20 min)
Self-drive from La Jolla to Little Italy (approx. 20 min)

timeline.title: Breakfast
timeline.description: Hotel breakfast and a relaxed start to the day.

timeline.title: Attractions
description: Short visit and photos in Joshua Tree National Park.
Suggested stops: Keys View, Skull Rock, Cholla Cactus Garden.

timeline.title: Transport
timeline.description: Leave the park and drive towards the lunch spot.

timeline.title: Lunch
description: Crossroads Cafe (Western-style cafe, famous banana bread, approx. USD 10–20).
Or In-N-Out Burger (quick burger stop in Cabazon area).
Or Natural Sisters Cafe (healthy vegetarian options in Joshua Tree town).

timeline.title: Accommodation
timeline.description: Check-in, drop off luggage, and rest.

timeline.title: Transport
timeline.description: Drive to Option 1 or Option 2

timeline.title: Attractions
description: Watch sea lions, cliffside walk, and photos.
Sunny Jim Sea Cave (USD 10 per person).

timeline.title: Dinner
timeline.location: Buy groceries and cook at Airbnb
description: Go to supermarket to buy ingredients.
Return to Airbnb and cook dinner.

timeline.title: Dinner
description: Filippi's Pizza Grotto (60-year-old pizzeria and restaurant, USD 15–25 per person).
Vincenzo Cucina (upscale Italian, must-try cheese wheel pasta, USD 30–50 per person).
Herb & Wood (chef-driven restaurant, USD 35–45 per person).
Born and Raised (premium steakhouse, USD 40–60 per person).

timeline.title: Transport
timeline.description: Option 1: Return to Airbnb from Little Italy

timeline.title: Accommodation
timeline.description: Arrive at Airbnb and rest.

day11.title: San Diego City Exploration
day11.description: Enjoy a relaxed breakfast at the Airbnb in the morning, then visit Balboa Park to explore museums and gardens. In the afternoon, visit San Diego Zoo, then head to Torrey Pines State Park for ocean views in the evening, and end the day with Mexican cuisine in Old Town.

meals.lunch: Balboa Park: Panama 66 / The Prado Restaurant
meals.dinner: Old Town: Casa Guadalajara / Cafe Coyote / Harrah's Cocina

transport: Self-drive to Balboa Park (approx. 15–20 min)
Within Balboa Park (approx. 5–10 min)
Self-drive to Torrey Pines (approx. 20–30 min)
Self-drive to Old Town (approx. 25–30 min)

timeline.title: Breakfast
timeline.description: Airbnb breakfast and a relaxed start to the day.

timeline.title: Attractions
description: Choose 1–2 museums or key gardens to visit.
Rose Garden, Japanese Friendship Garden, Lily Pond, Desert Garden.
You can drive between different areas of the park.

timeline.title: Transport
timeline.description: Move within Balboa Park

timeline.title: Attractions
description: [tickets] (USD 60–70 per person).
Take the guided bus tour.
Focus on big cats and aviary.

timeline.title: Lunch
description: Panama 66 (outdoor cafe).
The Prado Restaurant (Spanish-style, USD 15–25 per person).

timeline.title: Transport
timeline.description: Drive to Option 1 or Option 2

timeline.title: Attractions
description: Guy Fleming Trail (0.7-mile easy trail, 20–30 minutes) with ocean views.
Parking fee: USD 20 per day.
Walking sticks available for rent.
5:30-6:00 PM Drive to Old Town (approx. 25–30 min).
6:00-7:30 PM Dinner at Old Town.

timeline.title: Attractions
description: Visit Old Town historic district.
Dinner options available:
Casa Guadalajara (traditional Mexican cuisine, outdoor patio, USD 15–28 per person).
Cafe Coyote (food critic-recommended Mexican cuisine, USD 12–22 per person).
Harrah's Cocina (authentic flavors, USD 15–25 per person).

timeline.title: Transport
timeline.description: Return to Airbnb from Option 1 or Option 2 (Option 1 departs around 7:30 PM, Option 2 departs around 6:00 PM)

timeline.title: Accommodation
timeline.description: Arrive at Airbnb and rest.

day12.title: San Diego Highlights
day12.description: Visit USS Midway Aircraft Carrier Museum in the morning, enjoy lunch at Seaport Village, then explore Coronado Island in the afternoon to see Hotel del Coronado and shop. Take the ferry back to downtown in the evening, visit Gaslamp Quarter, then go to the supermarket to buy groceries and cook dinner at the Airbnb.

meals.lunch: Seaport Village: The Fish Market / Puesto / Ironside Fish & Oyster / Hard Rock Cafe
meals.dinner: Buy groceries and cook at Airbnb

transport: Self-drive to USS Midway (approx. 15–20 min)
Walk to Seaport Village (approx. 5 min)
Self-drive to Coronado Island (approx. 15–20 min)
Coronado Ferry back to Downtown (approx. 30 min)
Self-drive to Gaslamp Quarter (approx. 15 min)
Self-drive to supermarket (approx. 15–20 min)

timeline.title: Breakfast
timeline.description: Airbnb breakfast and a relaxed start to the day.

timeline.title: Attractions
description: [tickets] (USD 39–41 per person).
Explore real warship, cockpit, and aircraft displays.
Approx 3–4 hours.
Chinese audio guide available.

timeline.title: Transport
timeline.description: Walk

timeline.title: Lunch
description: The Fish Market (seafood buffet, USD 18–35 per person).
Puesto (Mexican cuisine, USD 15–28 per person).
Ironside Fish & Oyster (seafood, USD 20–40 per person).
Hard Rock Cafe (American fast food, USD 15–25 per person).

timeline.title: Attractions
description: Hotel del Coronado photo (famous pink palace hotel, free photos).
Orange Avenue stroll and shopping.
Centennial Park for San Diego skyline views.
Beach walk.
Bike rental available for island tour (requires stamina).

timeline.title: Transport
description: Coronado Ferry back to downtown.
Enjoy bay and city views.
USD 5 per person.
Great for elderly.

timeline.title: Attractions
description: Visit historic district.
Stroll and photos.

timeline.title: Transport
timeline.description: Go to supermarket to buy ingredients

timeline.title: Accommodation
description: Return to Airbnb.
Dinner + rest.

day13.title: Final Leisurely Time & Prepare to Return Home
day13.description: Visit Coronado Island and Seaport Village, then head to Ontario Airport in the evening to prepare for the return flight to Taiwan.
transport: Self-drive to airport (approx. 2 hours)
